```{r kmfunc, cache=cacheon}

kmfunc <- function(data, time, event, eventname, eventrec, hospvar, yposplus = rep(0.03, 2)) {
  cexmy <- 1.2
  fits <- survfit(formula(paste0("Surv(", time, ",", event, "=='Yes') ~ ", hospvar)),
    data = tcdata
  )

  # c(bottom, left, top, right)
  par(mar = c(6.5, 8.85, 1, 1) + 0.1)
  plots <- plot(fits,
    fun = "event",
    ylab = eventname,
    yscale = 100,
    col = global_cols[c(8, 3)],
    mark.time = FALSE,
    bty = "n",
    xlim = c(0, 6),
    ylim = c(0, 1),
    xlab = "Time since randomization (years)",
    cex.lab = cexmy,
    axes = F,
    lwd = 4,
    lty = c(1, 2),
    xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i"
  )

  axis(2, seq(0, 1, 0.25), seq(0, 100, 25), las = 2, cex.axis = cexmy)
  axis(1, at = seq(0, 6, 1), seq(0, 6, 1), cex.axis = cexmy)

  ypos <- 1 - summary(fits, 4, extend = T)$surv

  ylabs <- bind_cols(
    ypos = ypos,
    ytext = c("No previous HFH", "Previous HFH")
  ) %>%
    arrange(ypos)

  text(ylabs$ypos[1] - yposplus[1], x = 4, ylabs$ytext[1], pos = 4, cex = cexmy)
  text(ylabs$ypos[2] + yposplus[2], x = 4, ylabs$ytext[2], pos = 2, cex = cexmy)

  mtext("No. at risk", side = 1, line = 3.5, at = -1.8, adj = 0, cex = cexmy, font = 2)
  mtext("No previous HFH", side = 1, line = 4.5, at = -1.8, adj = 0, cex = cexmy)
  mtext("Previous HFH", side = 1, line = 5.5, at = -1.8, adj = 0, cex = cexmy)

  nrisk <- summary(fits, seq(0, 6, 1), extend = T)

  axis(1, at = seq(0, 6, 1), labels = nrisk$n.risk[nrisk$strata == levels(nrisk$strata)[1]], line = 3.5, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy)
  axis(1, at = seq(0, 6, 1), labels = nrisk$n.risk[nrisk$strata == levels(nrisk$strata)[2]], line = 4.5, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy)
}
```

```{r mcffunc, cache=cacheon}
mcffunc <- function(eventname, event, hospvar, yposplus = rep(0.05, 2)) {
  cexmy <- 1.2
  # needed for n at risk
  fitsn <- survfit(formula(paste0("Surv(outtime_cvd, out_cvd =='Yes') ~ ", hospvar)),
    data = tcdata
  )

  tmptcdataimprec <- tcdataimprec %>%
    filter(!!sym(event) == "Yes", eventno == lastevent) %>%
    mutate(!!sym(event) := "No",
      timestart = timestop,
      timestop = timestop
    )

  tmptcdataimprec <- bind_rows(tcdataimprec, tmptcdataimprec) %>%
    arrange(ID, timestart, timestop)

  fits <- mcf(formula(paste0("Recur(outtime, ID, ", event, " == 'Yes') ~ ", hospvar)), data = tmptcdataimprec)

  # c(bottom, left, top, right)
  par(mar = c(6.5, 8.85, 1, 1) + 0.1)

  plot(fits@MCF$time[fits@MCF$prevhfhosp1yr == "No"],
    fits@MCF$MCF[fits@MCF$prevhfhosp1yr == "No"],
    type = "l",
    ylab = paste0("Mean cumulative ", eventname, " (per 100 patients)"),
    col = global_cols[8],
    xlim = c(0, 6),
    ylim = c(0, 2),
    xlab = "Time since randomization (years)",
    cex.lab = cexmy,
    axes = F,
    lwd = 4,
    lty = 1,
    xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i"
  )

  lines(fits@MCF$time[fits@MCF$prevhfhosp1yr == "Yes"],
    fits@MCF$MCF[fits@MCF$prevhfhosp1yr == "Yes"],
    col = global_cols[3],
    lwd = 4,
    lty = 2
  )

  axis(2, seq(0, 2, 0.5), seq(0, 200, 50), las = 2, cex.axis = cexmy)
  axis(1, at = seq(0, 6, 1), seq(0, 6, 1), cex.axis = cexmy)

  ypos <- c(
    last(fits@MCF$MCF[fits@MCF$time <= 4 & fits@MCF$prevhfhosp1yr == "No"]),
    last(fits@MCF$MCF[fits@MCF$time <= 4 & fits@MCF$prevhfhosp1yr == "Yes"])
  )

  ylabs <- bind_cols(
    ypos = ypos,
    ytext = c("No previous HFH", "Previous HFH")
  ) %>%
    arrange(ypos)

  text(ylabs$ypos[1] - yposplus[1], x = 4, ylabs$ytext[1], pos = 4, cex = cexmy)
  text(ylabs$ypos[2] + yposplus[2], x = 4, ylabs$ytext[2], pos = 2, cex = cexmy)

  mtext("No. at risk", side = 1, line = 3.5, at = -1.8, adj = 0, cex = cexmy, font = 2)
  mtext("No previous HFH", side = 1, line = 4.5, at = -1.8, adj = 0, cex = cexmy)
  mtext("Previous HFH", side = 1, line = 5.5, at = -1.8, adj = 0, cex = cexmy)

  nrisk <- summary(fitsn, seq(0, 6, 1), extend = T)

  axis(1, at = seq(0, 6, 1), labels = nrisk$n.risk[nrisk$strata == levels(nrisk$strata)[1]], line = 3.5, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy)
  axis(1, at = seq(0, 6, 1), labels = nrisk$n.risk[nrisk$strata == levels(nrisk$strata)[2]], line = 4.5, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy)
}
```
